testsuite.name: tests.SD10_Verify_Mandatory_Checkout_Fields

testcase.name: test_SD10_Verify_Mandatory_Checkout_Fields
testcase.system-out: 1. Complete a successful login Navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/ Element clicked Successfully Signed In with the STANDARD account 2. Add any product to the cart and proceed to checkout Element clicked Sauce Labs backpack added to cart. Element clicked Element clicked 3. Leave First Name field empty 4. Fill Last name and ZIP code Element visible Text Field filled. Element visible Text Field filled. 5. Click continue Element clicked 6. Verify error message Element visible Element displayed Expected message: Error: First Name is required displayed Element clicked Element clicked 7. Repeat with zip code and Last name Checking missing zip code error. Element visible Text Field filled. Element visible Text Field filled. Element clicked Element visible Element displayed Expected message: Error: Postal Code is required displayed Element clicked Element clicked Checking missing Last Name error. Element visible Text Field filled. Element visible Text Field filled. Element clicked Element visible Element displayed Expected message: Error: Last Name is required displayed
